default.title: Are you 18 years old?
default.description: The information on the website is not intended for visitors under the age of 18. Please confirm your age to access it.
default.cookie: This site uses cookies to improve your experience. By visiting this resource, you consent to their use.

forbidden.title: I will wait for you later!
forbidden.description: The website contains information intended only for persons over 18 years old.

about.title: Who i am
about.fact1: My name is Yana Pavlyuts and I help men and women improve their sexual life. I work in a multimodal approach - a method that combines knowledge from different schools of psychology.
about.fact2: I have received training in International Academy of Sexology in the following programs:
about.fact3: I have been a member of the Association of Sexologists of the Russian Federation since 2019.
about.fact4: I have been in personal therapy for 5 years.

consultations.title: I can help with the following requests:

canHelp: difficulties in understanding the desires of the partner
communication difficulties on the topic of sex
lack of desire, decreased libido, loss of interest in partner
premature ejaculation or delayed sexual intercourse
notWork: working with prominent paraphilias (fetishism, voyeurism, pedophilia, exhibitionism)

consultations.title2: I do not work with the following requests:

payment.title: Payment
payment.altFormat: Two people are depicted opposite each other

userForm.title: Q&A
userForm.text1: Here you can ask your question.
userForm.text2: The form is anonymous, but to respond, you will need to specify the email address to which you expect a response.
userForm.text3: I may post some answers on the website. The question remains anonymous: without contacts or any other personal information.

tests.title: Tests
tests.description: Here you can find links to tests that may be needed during consultations. They can also be used for self-assessment. But for the most correct interpretation, I recommend to talk over with a specialist.
